content.raw: Hey Malcolm, I have a quick and dirty work-around for you: add in a rosservice call in your submission shell script and see if that repeatedly solves your issue in an automated manner.  Without seeing code snippets it’s a difficult to pinpoint the root cause of your issue but at least this workaround might give you some last-minute reprieve.
